column2: Slightly lethargic in cage. Ulcerated tumor on top of head-- reason for sac.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Skull was intact, but possible blood in brain
Extremely large nodule in thoracic cavity attached to lung along with some smaller nodules on lungs.
